# How to authenticate .NET applications with Azure services

> Documentation for How to authenticate .NET applications with Azure services.

*Topics available: 11*

- [Additional methods to authenticate to Azure from .NET apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/additional-methods.md): This article describes additional, less common methods you can use to authenticate your .NET app to Azure resources.
- [Authentication best practices with the Azure Identity library for .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/best-practices.md): This article describes authentication best practices to follow when using the Azure Identity library for .NET.
- [Create Azure Identity library credentials via configuration files](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/create-token-credentials-from-configuration.md): Learn how to create token credentials from configuration files.
- ['Credential chains in the Azure Identity library for .NET'](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/credential-chains.md): 'This article describes the DefaultAzureCredential and ChainedTokenCredential classes in the Azure Identity library.'
- [How to authenticate .NET applications with Azure services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/index.md): Learn how to authenticate a .NET app with Azure services by using classes in the Azure Identity library.
- [Authenticate .NET apps to Azure using brokered authentication.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/local-development-broker.md): Learn how to authenticate your app to Azure services when using the Azure SDK for .NET during local development using brokered authentication.
- [Authenticate .NET apps to Azure using developer accounts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/local-development-dev-accounts.md): Learn how to authenticate your application to Azure services when using the Azure SDK for .NET during local development using developer accounts.
- [Authenticate .NET apps to Azure services during local development using service principals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/local-development-service-principal.md): Learn how to authenticate your app to Azure services during local development using dedicated application service principals.
- [Authenticate to Azure resources from .NET apps hosted on-premises](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/on-premises-apps.md): This article describes how to authenticate your application to Azure services when using the Azure SDK for .NET in on-premises hosted apps.
- [Authenticate Azure-hosted .NET apps to Azure resources using a system-assigned managed identity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/system-assigned-managed-identity.md): Learn how to authenticate Azure-hosted .NET apps to other Azure services using a system-assigned managed identity.
- [Authenticate Azure-hosted .NET apps to Azure resources using a user-assigned managed identity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/azure/sdk/authentication/user-assigned-managed-identity.md): Learn how to authenticate Azure-hosted .NET apps to other Azure services using a user-assigned managed identity.
